definition: a saw/to cut with a saw

sentences.english: Its distinctly toothed leaves are carried on branching stems.
sentences.chinese: 在其分支的莖杆上，掛滿了非常顯眼的鋸齒狀樹葉。

sentences.english: The windows were decorated with decorated by a fringe of pinked cloth.
sentences.chinese: 窗戶用鋸齒形的布做成的流蘇作裝飾。

sentences.english: Surrounded by a jagged mountain ridge.
sentences.chinese: 它被鋸齒形的山脊所環繞。

sentences.english: In this article the electromagnetic scattering characteristics of serrate gaps common in aircraft surfaces are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對飛行器表面常見鋸齒縫隙的散射特性進行了研究。

sentences.english: The coach staggered his players in the back field.
sentences.chinese: 這位教練在後場擺了個鋸齒形防守陣式。

sentences.english: In fact I was afraid of those jagged monstrosities all around and over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 事實上我害怕我們頭頂四周那些鋸齒狀的巨獸。

sentences.english: Using long serrated knife, halve each cake horizontally.
sentences.chinese: 使用長的鋸齒型刀，水平地將每塊蛋糕分成兩半。

sentences.english: The built-in saw teeth makes it easy to tear the labels or bills.
sentences.chinese: 內建雙用鋸齒前擋裝置，方便標籤或票據的撕取。

sentences.english: A saw-toothed tail and large head distinguish the reclusive Chelydra serpentine, or 'snakelike swamp thing.
sentences.chinese: 鋸齒狀的尾巴，巨大的頭顱，是辨別鱷魚龜的特徵。

sentences.english: But as their bodies have grown, they have developed tiny saw-like teeth.
sentences.chinese: 但是隨着寄生蜂幼蟲的成長，他們已經長出小鋸齒。

sentences.english: Its zigzag markings looking like just another stone.
sentences.chinese: 看上去就像是一塊鋸齒形的石頭。

sentences.english: This photo is below the sawtooth-shaped car landing edge.
sentences.chinese: 照片下邊是此着陸車的鋸齒形邊緣。

sentences.english: The blade of groove is designed as sawtooth, saving effort and durable.
sentences.chinese: 槽刀採用鋸齒形設計刀片，省力耐用。

sentences.english: Sub-pixel anti-aliasing takes this even further to deliver an even better perception of round edges.
sentences.chinese: 亞像素防鋸齒則更進一步，把圓角效果做得更加完善。

sentences.english: The nozzle rim includes serrations as observed on the prototype.
sentences.chinese: 原型機的噴口邊緣有鋸齒。

sentences.english: He believes “a saw-toothed advance” will characterize a recovery this autumn.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲今年秋季的復甦將以“鋸齒式前進”爲特徵。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
